content.rendered:
We are best known for providing safe and secure Meet and Greet Airport parking across the UK at many of the major airports including; Birmingham, Edinburgh, Gatwick, Heathrow, Southampton Port, Southend and Stansted, we think, the easiest way to park at the airport.

We have been parking cars for more than 25 years, with an experienced team, who are friendly, fully insured and on hand to make your journey an easy and stress free one.

Meet and Greet can save time and money; let someone else park your car whilst you move straight to check in, especially popular for business travellers, young families and mobility users due to it being so close to the terminal with little walking involved.

Gatwick Buy With Confidence Award from West Sussex Trading Standards.

All of our car parks are Security Awarded and are either manned, patrolled or CCTV monitored 24/7, for your peace of mind.

Why Choose Maple Parking?

  • Your car is collected and delivered by a uniformed driver, who is CRB checked and customer focussed.
  • We are Approved Operators at all airports we service* with Park Mark and Trading Standards. *All airports that have a scheme in place.

Feedback and reviews.

We have thousands of honest feedback scores across TrustPilot, from real customers who have parked with us.
Our reviews are designed to make improvements to our services and to keep you (our customer) as informed and happy as possible.

Our Guarantee To You.

Your car is securely parked, supervised, carefully driven and looked after always. You can book your meet and greet parking online using our website. Our website is secured with SSL to ensure all data is private and passed securely.

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to give us a call on 03 333 222 333, our team is always on hand to help.
